price: (71) [Lot] said, "These are my daughters[681] - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
arabic: قَالَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِيٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ
footnotes: [681]- i.e., the women of his community who were lawful for marriage.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qāla hāulāi banātī in kuntum fāʿilīna
